description: An AI-powered content planning tool for creators. Generates AI images and videos from AI powered script.

backend: Supabase (Postgres + Auth for metadata, user accounts, projects, permissions)
Cloudflare R2 (S3-compatible storage for large assets)

storage.rule: Store only metadata and references in Supabase. Store large assets in R2. Link them by object key or URL.
storage.notes: Do not store large binary assets in Postgres. Use Supabase tables only for metadata and permissions.
